text: kaṭalttīratt sthiticeytirunna ā paṭṭaṇatteppaṟṟi nī avarēāṭ cēādicc nēākkū. (atāyat‌) śabbatt dinaṁ (śaniyāḻca) ācarikkunnatil avar atikramaṁ kāṇiccirunna sandarbhatteppaṟṟi. avaruṭe śabbatt dinattil avarkk āvaśyamuḷḷa matsyaṅṅaḷ veḷḷattinu mīte talakāṇiccukeāṇṭ avaruṭe aṭutt varukayuṁ avarkk śabbatt ācarikkānillātta divasattil avaruṭe aṭutt ava varātirikkukayuṁ ceytirunnasandarbhaṁ. avar dhikkariccirunnatinṟe phalamāyi aprakāraṁ nāṁ avare parīkṣikkukayāyirunnu
